page.title: 15EATON PARK HOUSING ESTATE
page.content:
Eaton Park Estate is shaped like a semi -circle.It is surrounded by rough grazing land.It is on high ground and you can see Berry Hill Industrial Estate with the N.C.B offices near Botteslow Farm,you can see Hanley town too.There are a lot of fields around the estate and usually they put horses in them.Our school Eaton Park Primary School is on the edge of the estate by the main feeder road, with Berry Hill High School opposite.There are four local shops that serve the people including a newsagent,a general store, butchers/post office and a baby wear shop.
My house is small having three bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs,a lounge and kitchen downstairs.Outside there is a small garden as well as a garage where we keep our family car(Odette Warrilow)
